title: Hit with $7146 for two hospital bills, a family sought health care in Mexico - NPR
content: Hit with $7146 for two hospital bills, a family sought health care in Mexico  NPR
description: A dad's COVID-19 and a mom's fainting spell cost thousands, so when their son dislocated his shoulder, they drove him to Mexicali, where facilities rival those in the U.S., and had him treated for $5.
